channel.title: What is my next move?
channel.description:
[center][size=12pt]I am at work extremely bored and seriously sick of this job. I won't go into details of why, I just am.[/center]
I have a couple options and I'm letting moparscape users decide which one is chosen. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1.) just leave. Who cares about your rent.
2.)Quit being a pussy and keep going.
3.)Make an excuse to go home(if so, what excuse would that be?) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you feel there should be another option then please put it in your message body and I may add it.

item.title: What is my next move?
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:14, topic:510268”]dude she apologized[/quote]So I take it you actually gathered up the strength and confronted her with the issue? The real test is if she changes any(even if it’s just around you)

Read full topic

item.title: What is my next move?
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:12, topic:510268”][quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=628514.msg4268380#msg4268380 date=1364320283]
There is one like that in every place of business. I say just deal with it. Pretending it doesn’t bother you is just going to irritate her more.

If you want a real psychological answer…actually confront her about the issue(s) you have with her.
[/quote]
I might do that. But to be honest… [size=1pt]she kind of intimidates me[/size][/quote]fully understandable but that’s why you need to confront her about it.

Read full topic

item.title: What is my next move?
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:510268”]I’m not sure what “shit” you take that would make you want to leave. Low pay? Workplace harassment?

Whatever the issue is, you need to stand up and correct it. Run from the problem and it will just follow you.[/quote]
The pay could always be better:p BUT more or less harassment. It’s almost like being ran by a slave driver. Its the owner, his wife and now me.

There was 2 others but they left. The owner is a nice guy but his wife… I can’t put into words how I feel

Read full topic

explain this shit so we can give you a more appropriate answer.

item.description:

I’m not sure what “shit” you take that would make you want to leave. Low pay? Workplace harassment?

Whatever the issue is, you need to stand up and correct it. Run from the problem and it will just follow you.

item.title: What is my next move?
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

imthenull:

Why don’t you be grateful that you have a job…?

Oh, I am. If you knew the shit I took here then you would want to leave.
I’m not that guy that “wants a job” then just doesnt show up or complains that he works too much.

there is a reason im the only employee

Read full topic
